name: Disrupting PSN Information Networks
description: Tactical interference in PSN-controlled media, propaganda systems, and disinformation campaigns.
focus: Severing Their Control Over Public Perception

cards.title: Subverting Controlled Media Outlets
cards.description: Infiltrating and weakening PSN-aligned information channels.
bulletpoints: Exploiting inconsistencies in their narratives to erode public trust.
Leveraging insider sources to release controlled leaks.
Creating viral counter-messaging that disrupts their perception control.
cards.summaryText: Infiltrate their outlets, leak contradictions, and launch viral counters until trust collapses.

cards.title: Hijacking the PSN Information Pipeline
cards.description: Redirecting and corrupting their disinformation networks.
bulletpoints: Inserting false narratives into their propaganda to cause misalignment.
Triggering internal conflicts by amplifying factional disagreements.
Disseminating alternative perspectives to weaken their ideological monopoly.
cards.summaryText: Poison their pipeline with falsities, amplify faction fights, and flood audiences with rival frames.

cards.title: Targeting Their Internal Communications
cards.description: Disrupting their ability to coordinate and execute strategies efficiently.
bulletpoints: Flooding their communication channels with misinformation and noise.
Orchestrating internal trust breakdowns that lead to division.
Severing their key information links through targeted disconnections.
cards.summaryText: Jam their comms with noise, shatter internal trust, and cut the lines they rely on.
